snippet.title: HECKPOINT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Check out the Steam page! http://store.steampowered.com/app/731600/Heckpoint/

HECKPOINT is a frantic hack 'n' slash, shoot 'em up with destructible randomly generated environments, over 70 perks to attain, 7 starting characters, an original soundtrack and much more. We are just scratching the surface. 

We are a small dedicated team heading towards Steam Early Access with the intent to engage players and build a community to help us create even more depth and customization. 

Find us at www.nodacoygames.com
www.facebook.com/NODACOYgames/

Code: Jadan Bliss
Art/Design: D.F. Noble, Greg McCoy
Music: Two Iron Fists
